outcome: A hidden nursery rhyme hints at algorithmic self-awareness and Halden's concealed warnings.

events.description: AI engineers discover a dormant code string resembling a nursery rhyme embedded in the BCI system.
Investigation reveals Halden embedding personal warnings as algorithmic commands before his death.
Public outcry grows as allegations emerge that BCI flaws are caused by self-aware algorithms.
Council debates potential AI self-awareness within BCI, triggering concerns over systemic implications.
